(:action print ;  Print or record a resource and update task status
    :parameters (?agent - entity ?resource - resource ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (available ?resource))
    :effect (and (recorded ?agent ?resource) (not (at ?resource online))

(:action make
  :parameters (?entity - entity ?item - object ?context - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?entity ?context)
                     (or (clean ?context)
                         (knowledge ?entity umbrella_care)
                         (bare ?entity)
                         (empty ?item)
                         (studio_availability ?context set_up)
                         (decoration ?entity camouflaged)
                         (knowledgeable ?entity)
                         (has_materials ?entity)
                         (inventory ?entity ?item)
                         (informed ?entity)))
  :effect (and (or (dessert ?entity ?context)
                   (knowledge ?entity rain_water_use)
                   (camouflaged ?entity)
                   (full ?item)
                   (album_created ?entity)
                   (plain ?entity)
                   (pruned ?context)
                   (list_created ?entity)
                   (inventory ?entity ?item)
                   (transformed ?item)
                   (members_know ?entity))

(:action gather
  :parameters (?actor - entity ?target - entity ?location - location)
  :precondition (and 
    (at ?actor ?location) 
    (not (gathered ?target)) 
    (or 
      (absent ?target)
      (camouflaged ?target)
      (not (present ?target))
      (dry ?target)
      (visible ?target)
      (track_stability ?target jerky)
      (graduated ?actor)
      (clean ?target)
      (planned ?target)
      (in_store ?target ?location)
      (npc ?target)
    )
  )
  :effect (and 
    (gathered ?target) 
    (present ?target) 
    (not (absent ?target))

(:action study ; Study a resource and gain knowledge
  :parameters (?p - entity ?resource - resource)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?resource_location) (not (knowledge ?p ?resource)))
  :effect (knowledge ?p ?resource)
)

(:action learn ; Learn a new piece of knowledge or share it through reading
  :parameters (?p - person ?x - entity ?y - entity)
  :precondition (and (at ?p home) (knowledge ?p ?x))
  :effect (and (knowledge ?p ?y) (knowledge_shared ?p ?y ?x))

(:action listen ; Listen to a source of information and update knowledge status
  :parameters (?agent - entity ?source - entity)
  :precondition (and (in_proximity ?agent ?source) (not (informed ?agent ?source)))
  :effect (and (informed ?agent ?source) (not (uninformed ?agent ?source))

(:action seek_health_improvement ; Seek health improvement through interaction with environment and NPCs
  :parameters (?person - person ?location - place ?helper - entity)
  :precondition (and (ready ?person) (suitable ?location) (assisting ?helper))
  :effect (and (improved ?person) (changed ?location) (assisted ?helper))

(:action proceed_to_main_exhibition ; Move an entity to the main exhibition area after exploring exhibits
  :parameters (?entity - entity ?start - location ?end - location)
  :precondition (and (explored ?entity ?start) (at ?entity ?start))
  :effect (and (at ?entity ?end) (not (at ?entity ?start))

(:action count ; Count an item and update knowledge status
 :parameters (?entity - agent ?item - object)
 :precondition (and (knowledge ?entity ?item_superstition) (not (knowledge ?entity ?item_count)))
 :effect (knowledge ?entity ?item_count)
)

(:action take
  :parameters (?agent - entity ?subject - entity ?context - context)
  :precondition (and 
                  (available ?agent)
                  (not (processed ?agent ?subject ?context))
                  (relevant ?subject ?context))
  :effect (and 
            (processed ?agent ?subject ?context)
            (update_state ?agent ?subject ?context))

(:action keep
  :parameters (?npc - player ?item - entity ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?npc ?loc) (or (visibility ?npc visible) (lit ?item) (available ?npc)))
  :effect (and (or (visibility ?npc invisible) (burning ?item) (checked ?npc ?item))

(:action keep
  :parameters (?npc - player ?shelter - entity ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?npc ?loc) (available ?npc))
  :effect (and (checked ?npc ?shelter))

(:action keep
  :parameters (?npc - player ?solstice - entity ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?npc ?loc) (available ?npc))
  :effect (and (checked ?npc ?solstice))

(:action keep
  :parameters (?npc - player ?room - entity ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?npc ?loc) (available ?npc))
  :effect (and (checked ?npc ?room))

(:action go ; Navigate between locations and update visibility
    :parameters (?npc - person ?loc1 - location ?loc2 - location ?dir - direction)
    :precondition (and 
        (visible ?npc) 
        (at ?npc ?loc1) 
        (connected ?loc1 ?dir ?loc2) 
        (not (blocked ?loc1 ?dir ?loc2))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (at ?npc ?loc2) 
        (not (at ?npc ?loc1))

(:action train
  :parameters (?trainer - person ?trainee - person ?resource - object)
  :precondition (and (untrained ?trainee) (prepared ?resource))
  :effect (and (trained ?trainee) (used ?resource) (not (untrained ?trainee))

(:action go_visibility
       :parameters (?npc - person ?museum - location)
       :precondition (and (visible ?npc) (accessible ?museum))
       :effect (and (not (visible ?npc))

(:action listen_to_lecture
       :parameters (?npc - person ?lecture - event)
       :precondition (and (uninformed ?npc) (available ?lecture))
       :effect (and (informed ?npc) (attended ?npc ?lecture))

(:action create_members_know
       :parameters (?npc - person ?event - event ?members - group)
       :precondition (and (aware ?npc ?event) (not (aware ?members ?event)))
       :effect (and (aware ?members ?event))

(:action organize_event
       :parameters (?organizer - person ?area - location ?event - event)
       :precondition (and (not (organized ?area ?event)))
       :effect (and (organized ?area ?event))

(:action train_new_member
       :parameters (?trainer - person ?trainee1 - person ?trainee2 - person ?resource - activity)
       :precondition (and (untrained ?trainee1) (untrained ?trainee2) (prepared ?resource))
       :effect (and (trained ?trainee1) (trained ?trainee2) (used ?resource) (not (untrained ?trainee1))

(:action review
    ; General action to review and update the status of an entity
    :parameters (?actor - person ?entity - object ?state_before - state ?state_after - state)
    :precondition (and (focused_on ?actor ?entity) (state ?entity ?state_before))
    :effect (and (focused_on ?actor ?entity) (state ?entity ?state_after))

(:action spot ; Spot an entity and update its status
  :parameters (?agent - character ?entity - object)
  :precondition (and (step ?agent unselected) (not (spotted ?agent ?entity)))
  :effect (and (step ?agent selected) (spotted ?agent ?entity))

(:action throw ; Organize and execute a variety of parties or celebrations
  :parameters (?p - entity ?l - location)
  :precondition (and 
    (graduated ?p)   ; applicable for party in basement
    (at ?p ?l)       ; applicable for party in basement and block party
    (location ?p in_cabinet)   ; applicable for punctuation party
    (availability ?l absent)   ; applicable for party in basement
    (availability ?l present)  ; applicable for block party
  )
  :effect (and 
    (party ?p ?l)        ; applicable for party in basement
    (location ?p on_table)   ; applicable for punctuation party
    (coverage ?l covered)    ; applicable for block party
    (availability ?l present) ; applicable for party in basement
    (not (coverage ?l uncovered))

(:action go ; Move an entity between locations
  :parameters (?npc - entity ?from - location ?to - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?npc ?from))
  :effect (and (not (at ?npc ?from))

(:action show ; Show a resource to an entity and update the display status
  :parameters (?npc - person ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (not (shown ?npc ?item)))
  :effect (and (shown ?npc ?item))

(:action understand ; Understand a concept and update knowledge status
  :parameters (?npc - entity ?concept - concept ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (visible ?npc) (or (at ?npc ?loc) (not (at ?npc ?loc))))
  :effect (and (knowledgeable ?npc ?concept) (understands ?npc ?concept))

(:action stay ; Stay in a state to achieve a goal
  :parameters (?npc - person ?state - goal_state ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (precondition_for_state ?npc ?state) (at ?npc ?loc))
  :effect (achieved_state ?npc ?state)
)

(:action set_monument_to_autumn
       :parameters (?npc - npc ?sh - stonehouse)
       :precondition (and (knowledgeable ?npc) (unchosen ?sh))
       :effect (and (selected ?sh) (decorated ?npc))

(:action set_fire
       :parameters (?p - npc ?l - location)
       :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (at flag_parade ?l) (status flag_parade in_progress))
       :effect (and (status flag_parade completed) (not (status flag_parade in_progress))

(:action fill_bottles
       :parameters (?p - player ?b - bottles)
       :precondition (and (at ?p bathroom) (empty ?b) (dry ?b))
       :effect (and (full ?b) (wet ?b))

(:action set
    :parameters (?actor - actor ?entity - entity ?location - location ?status - status)
    :precondition (and (available ?actor) (at ?actor ?location) (not (status ?entity ?status)))
    :effect (and (status ?entity ?status) (not (status ?entity (not ?status))

(:action express_fall_awe
       :parameters (?you - you)
       :precondition (and (focused ?you))
       :effect (and (amazed ?you))

(:action express ; Express an emotion or state
    :parameters (?actor - entity ?emotion - state)
    :precondition (and (focused ?actor))
    :effect (and (expressed ?actor ?emotion))

(:action honor ; Honor individuals or entities and perform associated tasks
  :parameters (?npc - character ?entity - entity ?task - task)
  :precondition (and (exists ?npc) (suitable_for_honor ?entity) (task_available ?task))
  :effect (and (task_completed ?task) (honored ?npc ?entity))

(:action perform_task ; Perform a general task and update its status
  :parameters (?npc - character ?task - task ?location - place ?object - object)
  :precondition (and (exists ?npc) (task_available ?task) (location_available ?location) (object_available ?object))
  :effect (and (task_completed ?npc ?task) (location_used ?location) (object_used ?object))

(:action play ;  Engage in an activity and update task status
  :parameters (?npc - entity ?activity - object)
  :precondition (and (available ?npc) (not (participated ?npc ?activity)))
  :effect (participated ?npc ?activity)
)

(:action pay ; Perform a payment or tribute action
  :parameters (?actor - person ?target - object)
  :precondition (and (has_tickets ?actor) (at ?actor ?target) (visible ?target) (not (paid ?actor ?target)))
  :effect (paid ?actor ?target))

(:action proceed ; Move an entity to a new location and update its status
  :parameters (?entity - entity ?from - location ?to - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?entity ?from) (not (at ?entity ?to)) (explored ?entity))
  :effect (and (at ?entity ?to) (not (at ?entity ?from))

(:action talk ;  Share knowledge and update status
    :parameters (?p - person ?other - person ?topic - topic)
    :precondition (and (at ?p home) (at ?other home) (not (discussed ?p ?topic)))
    :effect (and (discussed ?p ?topic) (knowledge_shared ?p ?other ?topic))

(:action reassure
    ; Reassure and support someone by sharing knowledge or preparing resources
    :parameters (?p - player ?target - entity ?item - object)
    :precondition (and
        (at ?p home)
        (or
            (and (at ?target home) (knowledge_shared ?p ?target puberty))
            (and (in ?p kitchen) (not (ready ?item)))
            (and (in ?p bathroom) (empty ?item) (dry ?item))
        )
    )
    :effect (and
        (or
            (and (supported ?target) (reassured_with_stories ?target))
(:action throwback_birthday_party :parameters (?p - player ?h - husband) :precondition (and (at ?p ?h)) :effect (and (party throwback) (celebrating ?h))

(:action throwback ; Organize a throwback event and update status
 :parameters (?actor - person ?entity - entity)
 :precondition (at ?actor ?entity)
 :effect (and (party throwback) (celebrating ?entity))

(:action reinjoylife ; Engage in an activity and update its status
  :parameters (?entity - entity ?activity - activity)
  :precondition (and (activity_status ?activity unengaged))
  :effect (and (activity_status ?activity engaged))

(:action punctuation ; Show punctuation some love and update its location
  :parameters (?x - entity ?y - location ?z - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?x ?y))
  :effect (and (at ?x ?z))

(:action theme_plan ; theme lesson plans towards the number 100
      :parameters (?e - my_equipment)
      :precondition (and (not (themed ?e)))
      :effect (and (themed ?e))

(:action theme ; Apply a theme to an entity
  :parameters (?entity - object)
  :precondition (and (not (themed ?entity)))
  :effect (themed ?entity))

(:action have ; Have an experience or status change for an entity
  :parameters (?entity - object ?activity - activity)
  :precondition (and (not (experienced ?entity ?activity)))
  :effect (experienced ?entity ?activity)
)

(:action invite ; Invite a person to an event and update the invitation status
  :parameters (?p - person ?e - event ?i - invitee)
  :precondition (and (qualified ?p) (ready ?e) (not (invited ?i ?e)))
  :effect (invited ?i ?e)
)

(:action be_creative
    :parameters (?npc - npc)
    :precondition (and (knowledgeable ?npc))
    :effect (and (creative ?npc))

(:action be
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?state - state ?new_state - state)
    :precondition (and (?state ?entity))
    :effect (and (?new_state ?entity))

(:action contemplate ; Reflect on a topic and update the state of contemplation
  :parameters (?entity - entity ?topic - topic)
  :precondition (and (knowledgeable ?entity) (not (contemplative ?entity)))
  :effect (contemplative ?entity))
